<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Crying Angel Pendant](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2967)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=579" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 263 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

When you activate this alabaster pendant, attempt to [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=54) using Medicine with a +1 item bonus to the check. If you succeed, and you were trying to stabilize, the target regains 1 Hit Point, losing the dying condition and becoming conscious as normal. If you succeed, and you were trying to stop bleeding, the bleeding ends.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Crying Angel Pendant
